TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 11}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 64, "index": 17}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 48, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 14, "index": 37}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 57, "index": 40}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft a diamond_shovel, which requires a diamond and a stick. I need to craft a diamond first, which requires a diamond_ore or diamond_block. I have a diamond_block at slot 45, so I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
